suite.name: OJT-activity

test.name: Student Registration System

kw.name: Open Login Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
This keyword is for opening the login page

kw.name: Verify Login Elements
Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Verify Login validation
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Loginvalidation
kw.msg: ${result} = Invalid user name but valid password

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: result: Invalid user name but valid password
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verify Activate/Deactive button Functionality
Execute Javascript
kw.arg: var table = document.querySelector(".table-scroll"); if (table) { table.scrollLeft = table.scrollWidth; }
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'css=tbody tr:nth-child(1) td:nth-child(18)' should have contained text 'Inactive' but its text was 'Active'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.status: Element 'css=tbody tr:nth-child(1) td:nth-child(18)' should have contained text 'Inactive' but its text was 'Active'.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

test.doc: This test suite is for the Student Registration System for login validation,logout functionality, student search functionality and validation and activate/deactivate button functionality

suite.doc: This test suite is for Student Registration System Functionality, validation UI/UX, scenarios testing Auhort: Neovern Enricoso
